press_reference_link.label: Northstar Announces Closing of First Tranche of Private Placement and Announces CFO Transition

news_insight_text_link.news_insight_description: Northstar Clean Technologies announced its first U.S. asphalt shingle reprocessing facility will supply TAMKO's production facility. The company received a second government grant of $100,000 from Alberta Innovates for its Calgary facility, and its first long-lead equipment item. Additionally, it secured C$1.34 million in grant funding from ERA and filed its 2023 financial results. Northstar was also issued a second patent by the United States Patent & Trademark Office.

research_insight_text_link.research_insight_description: Northstar Clean Technologies is engaged in the innovation of recycling asphalt-based roofing materials. Their R&D efforts include a method that involves using pressurized fluid streams to mechanically separate aggregate from asphalt-based materials. This process is designed to facilitate the recovery and reprocessing of single-use asphalt shingles, aligning with the company's focus on sustainability in construction materials. Each area of research and development reflects a commitment to advancing environmental responsibility in the building industry.

overview_description.description: Northstar Clean Technologies focuses on the recovery of components and provides Environmentally-friendly reprocessing solutions for single-use asphalt shingles. The company was founded in 2017 and is headquartered in Delta, British Columbia, Canada.

properties.growth_insight_description: Northstar Clean Technologies reported its financial results for the first quarter of 2024 and the year 2023. The company also announced the closing of the final tranche of an over-subscribed private placement. Additionally, Northstar received its first delivery of asphalt shingles from Ecco Recycling at its Empower Calgary facility and participated in the 2024 Canadian Climate Investor Conference.

about_short_description.short_description: Northstar Clean Technologies focuses on the recovery and reprocessing of single-use asphalt shingles.

product.name: Asphalt Shingle Reprocessing
product.description: Northstar Clean Technologies specializes in the sustainable recovery and reprocessing of single-use asphalt shingles into liquid asphalt, aggregate, and fiber.

product.name: Empower Calgary Facility
product.description: A facility dedicated to the reprocessing of used or defective asphalt shingle waste into its primary components for reuse.

product.name: Bitumen Extraction and Separation Technology (BEST)
product.description: A proprietary process design by Northstar for separating asphalt shingles into liquid asphalt, aggregate, and fiber.

product.name: Tipping Fees
product.description: Northstar generates revenue by charging fees for accepting asphalt shingle waste at its facilities.
